subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Snow and Snowstorms
Dogs
lead_paragraph: The Little Su, a 31-mile trek across frozen rivers and snowy swamps, is open to skiers, snowshoers and runners but it is often won by competitors using a bicycle.
snippet: The Little Su, a 31-mile trek across frozen rivers and snowy swamps, is open to skiers, snowshoers and runners but it is often won by competitors using a bicycle.
